members.name: config
members.doc:
• pixelRadius: The clustering radius expressed in PX. Default: 15
  • removeOutofBB: Tell the clustering to remove pins that are out of the bounding box. Default: true
  • maxDeltaToCluster: The value before the clustering is off. Default: 0.3
members.short_doc: pixelRadius: The clustering radius expressed in PX. ...

members.name: checkForDependencies
members.doc:
Check if the Google Play Services are installed and updated, otherwise Maps doesn't work and the app crashes.

It the check fail, an error is displayed that redirect to the Play Store, and the app is terminated.

On iOS, this check simply return true
members.short_doc: Check if the Google Play Services are installed and updated, otherwise Maps doesn't work and the app crashes. ...

members.name: cluster
members.doc:
Process a set of markers and cluster them

Each marker must be in this format:

{
    lat:    {Number},
    lng:    {Number},
    id:     {Number (unique)}
}

params.name: markers
params.doc: The markers must be an instance of Backbone.Collection or an Object id-indexed

return.name: return
return.doc:
An array of markers in this format:

If the marker is a cluster, an object like { latitude: {Number}, longitude: {Number}, count: {Number} } is passed, otherwise, the ID of the marker in your marker collections.

members.doc: Return the distance express in km between two points of the earth
